title: What is the difference between hard rock and rock music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rock Music : A genre of music that involves the usage of electric guitar (any other attempt at embodiment of the Rock and Roll spirit for a particular piece to be classified as rock or not would be rather vague and argumentative) Hard Rock : A sub-genre of rock music that is characterized by either/or usage of distortion, grunge, bass or thematically strong vocals or lyrics.
Rock music is a genre, and hard rock a sub-genre. Think of rock as a tree, and hard rock as a branch.
